venue.address_1: at the intersection of Charles St and Boylston St
venue.name: Boston Common - Charles Street side

item.description:
We're playing on Boston Common on Sunday. Remember the rule on Boston Common - no cleats! (But Boots are awesome and especially helpful in snow! )

If you are new and are not sure how to get to the field, check out the details on Boston Common. If you have questions, then contact either of the organizers listed for this game day.

Here's the game plan:

  • 1:00 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 1:15 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 1:30- Play!!!!!!
  • 3:00 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing


As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, pinnies, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

Joe
item.name: Sunday Ultimate Snow Love @ Boston Common
